content.raw:
The 3d lidar sensor position on X1 Config 3, X1 Config 4, and X2 Config 6 models have been updated. 

To get the updated models, remove the cached versions from your fuel cache directory, e.g.

```
rm -r ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/X1\ Config\ 3/
rm -r ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/X1\ Config\ 4/
rm -r ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/X2\ Config\ 6/
```
content.html:
The 3d lidar sensor position on X1 Config 3, X1 Config 4, and X2 Config 6 models have been updated.

To get the updated models, remove the cached versions from your fuel cache directory, e.g.

rm -r ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/X1\ Config\ 3/
rm -r ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/X1\ Config\ 4/
rm -r ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/X2\ Config\ 6/
